item.title: Object Multiple Teleports
item.dc:creator: @josh1993nhs josh1993nhs
item.description:
@josh1993nhs wrote:

I Need to make an object teleport you to multiple places, this is the code for mine that currently works.
[code] if (objectID == 4156)
{
teleEffect = 1;

			sendQuest("King Black Dragon", 2482);
			sendQuest("God Wars Dungeon", 2483);
			sendQuest("Green Dragons", 2484);
			sendQuest("Slayer Tower", 2485);
			sendFrame164(2480);
}[/code]

And the one i currently want to add is : [code] if (objectID == 8972)
{
teleEffect = 1;

			sendQuest("Fishing and Cooking", 2482);
			sendQuest("Woodcutting and Firemaking", 2483);
			sendQuest("Mining and Smithing", 2484);
			sendQuest("Farming and Runecrafting", 2485);
			sendFrame164(2480);
}[/code]

I Need to change the coordinates for the teleports, without messing up the other portal,
im unsure of how you would go about doing it, if anyone could help i would appreciate it.

Its a delta by the way.

Read full topic
